paragraph.taxonomicName: Cicindela ( Cicindela ) turkestanicoides turkestanicoides W. Horn, 1938

subSubSection.paragraph: Citations: Sefid-rud 5 km south of Ebrahimabad, Miyane, 1050 m ; Sefid-rud below Rudbar (Prov. of Gilan; Franzen & Gebert, 2003 ); Zanjan Road below Zanjan, 1500 m (Prov. of Zanjan; Franzen & Gebert, 2003 ); Harmalah (Prov. of Khuzestan; Franzen & Gebert, 2003 ).
